name: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, Inc.
description: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, Inc. is a leading global hotel franchising company headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey. Established in 2018 as a spin-off from Wyndham Worldwide, the company specializes in hotel and resort management and franchise operations. With a portfolio that includes over 9,000 hotels across more than 80 countries, Wyndham Hotels & Resorts caters to a diverse range of travelers through its well-known brands, including Super 8, Days Inn, Ramada, Howard Johnson, and Wyndham Grand. The company focuses on providing quality accommodations at affordable prices, making it a go-to choice for both business and leisure travelers. Wyndham also emphasizes its commitment to sustainability and community involvement, striving to enhance the guest experience through innovative services and amenities. The company is dedicated to expanding its footprint in key markets while leveraging technology to improve operational efficiency and customer engagement. Wyndham Hotels & Resorts aims to be the world's largest and most diverse hotel company, offering various lodging options that meet the needs of every traveler.

seo.meta_title: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts | Global Hotel Franchising
seo.meta_description: Explore Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, a global leader in hotel franchising with a diverse portfolio of well-known brands. Experience quality accommodations worldwide.

faq.question: What does Wyndham Hotels & Resorts do?
faq.answer: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts is a hotel franchising company managing a diverse portfolio of hotel brands globally.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts?
faq.answer: Geoff Ballotti is the CEO of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Wyndham Hotels & Resorts headquartered?
faq.answer: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What are the main hotel brands under Wyndham?
faq.answer: Wyndham's main hotel brands include Super 8, Days Inn, Ramada, Howard Johnson, and Wyndham Grand.

faq.question: When was Wyndham Hotels & Resorts founded?
faq.answer: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts was founded in 2018.
